title: The Dirty Work
description: A crime Sukey shouldn?t be investigating . . . if she wants to stay alive The work of a Scenes of Crime Officer is usually straightforward but this particularly gory murder is messy in more ways than one. Sukey's habit of getting overly involved in cases has been putting a strain on her affair with DI Jim Castle, but this time he can?t afford to be indifferent to her conclusions.
author: Betty Rowlands
